args: HOST="${CHROME_DEBUG_HOST:-host.docker.internal}"; PORT="${CHROME_DEBUG_PORT:-9222}"; if echo "$HOST" | grep -Eq '^[0-9]+[.][0-9]+[.][0-9]+[.][0-9]+$'; then IP="$HOST"; else IP="$(getent hosts "$HOST" 2>/dev/null | awk 'NR==1{print $1}')"; fi; if [ -z "$IP" ]; then echo "Failed to resolve CHROME_DEBUG_HOST ($HOST) to an IP address" >&2; exit 2; fi; exec npx -y chrome-devtools-mcp@latest --browser-url="http://$IP:$PORT"
